events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and resolve the customer's issue promptly.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the details?
Here is the photo of the product I got and the order number: 12345ABC. As you can see, it’s clearly not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a free return shipment.
That sounds perfect. I appreciate the quick response and looking forward to the refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was received and no further issues were reported, the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
